sense.def:
Stvari, ki so
long-term
, naj bi obstajale še dolgo v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: ...hopes for a long-term solution to the problem.
I hesitated before making a long-term commitment.

sense.def:
Kadar govorimo o tistem, kar se dogaja
in the long term
, mislimo na tisto, kar se dogaja v dolgem obdobju.

seg.quote: The results, in the long term, were successful.
